commit.message:
c-tree.texi (FUNCTION_TYPE): Clarify TYPE_ARG_TYPES for unprototyped C functions with no parameters.

	* c-tree.texi (FUNCTION_TYPE): Clarify TYPE_ARG_TYPES for
	unprototyped C functions with no parameters.

From-SVN: r37321
